SELECT log.id,ip,log.oper_time operTime,t.user_name userName, log.description,log.operType FROM t_operation_log log ,t_user t WHERE log.user_id = t.user_id
AND (log.oper_time >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and log.oper_time <= to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_user c WHERE c.user_name = #{userName} AND c.user_id = log.user_id)
AND description like '%${description}%'
order by log.oper_time desc
SELECT log.operType FROM t_operation_log log GROUP BY operType
mapper.update: UPDATE t_operation_log SET status_cd='00X' WHERE id=#{logId}
mapper.select: select content,params from t_operation_log_template t where t.language = #{language} and t.code = #{code} limit 0,1
